sentences.sContent: A new circus is in town, with Siberian white tigers and daredevil bikers.
sentences.sCn: 镇里来了一个新的马戏团，有西伯利亚白老虎和不怕死的自行车表演客。

remMethod.val: dare(大胆) + devil(鬼) → 比鬼还大胆 → 胆大的

trans.tranOther: Daredevil people enjoy doing physically dangerous things

trans.tranCn: 胆大的人， 冒失的人
trans.tranOther: someone who likes doing dangerous things
